page.title: 01THE SANDY AREA
page.content: SANDY IS A PLEASANT BEDFORDSHIRE TOWN WITH A POPULATION OF APPROXIMATELY 8,000 AND IS SITUATED 48 MILES NORTH OF LONDON, 9 MILES EAST OF BEDFORD AND 22 MILES WEST OF CAMBRIDGE. ACCESS BY ROAD IS GOOD AS JUST WEST OF THE TOWN RUNS THE A1. RAIL COMMUNICATIONS ARE ALSO GOOD AND THERE ARE SERVICES TO STEVENAGE, LONDON AND PETERBOROUGH. SANDY TOWN CENTRE OFFERS ALL ESSENTIAL SHOPPING FACILITIES AND THERE IS A WEEKLY MARKET. THE SOIL AROUND SANDY IS VERY FERTILE AND BECAUSE OF THIS MARKET GARDENING IS AN IMPORTANT LOCAL ACTIVITY. IN RECENT YEARS THE AREA HAS ATTRACTED A FAIR AMOUNT OF LIGHT INDUSTRY ALTHOUGH SANDY STILL RETAINS THE ATMOSPHERE OF A COUNTRY TOWN, THE SURROUNDING AREA BEING ALMOST ENTIRELY AGRICULTURAL.
